topic.title: Upgrade Strategies
topic.shortdesc: Upgrade a Couchbase Server cluster in a manner that is best suited to your operations.

body.p:
The following upgrade strategies are available:
Standard online upgrade
Swap rebalance online upgrade
Offline upgrade
Cross Datacenter Replication (XDCR) Both the online and offline upgrade processes have trade-offs. The following table illustrates some important aspects of the two upgrade strategies.

table.title: Differences between online and offline upgrades

row.entry: All cluster nodes are upgraded at once.

body.note: Mac OSX does not support a direct upgrade. When upgrading on this platform, first back up your data and perform a clean uninstall of the old version. Once you install the new version, restore the data back to the new cluster.
